roles.title: Founder & Head Coach
bullets: Established a community-oriented academy serving junior through youth cricketers
Designed age-group curricula (U10, U12, U14, U16) with progressive skill targets
Runs regular practice blocks (4+ sessions/week during peak), seasonal camps, and mini-tournaments
Coordinates friendly matches and open trials; facilitates player showcases and highlight reels
Specialized in fielding drills, batting mechanics, bowling rhythm, match awareness, and fitness & nutrition basics
